title: Evaluation of the Electrochemical Energy Storage Performance of Symmetric Supercapacitor Devices based on Eco-friendly Synthesized Nitrogen-Doped Graphene-Like Derivatives Electrodes in Light of their Nanostructure Characteristics
content:

The potential use of several ecofriendly Nitrogen-doped 2D graphene-like derivatives (N-2D GDs) of various graphitic structure features, as electrode materials in symmetric 2-electrode supercapacitor devices, has been explored. N-2D GDs...
